meanings.definition: A person who delivers a sales pitch or promotes a product or service.
meanings.sent1: The pitchman enthusiastically described the new vacuum cleaner to the audience.
meanings.sent2: The pitchman at the fair convinced many people to try the delicious snacks.
meanings.sent3: The pitchman tried to sell a broken umbrella to a penguin - quite a sight!
meanings.sent4: The pitchman's words were like a melody that convinced everyone to buy the product.
meanings.sent5: The pitchman's energetic gestures made the sales pitch unforgettable.

meanings.sent1: He decided to pitchman for the new line of beauty products.
meanings.sent2: She will pitchman the latest gadgets at the upcoming tech expo.
meanings.sent3: The children loved to watch their dad pitchman the toys in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to pitchman ideas made her a valuable asset to the team.
meanings.sent5: The way he could pitchman anything made him a successful salesman.
